# MKLocalSearch.Response

**Class**

The results from a map-based search.

## Declaration

```swift
class Response
```

## Overview

You don’t create instances of this class directly. After initiating a map search using an [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKLocalSearch] object, MapKit passes an instance of this class to your completion handler.

## Getting the search results

- **mapItems**: An array of map items representing the search results.
- **boundingRegion**: The map region that encloses the returned search results.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
